email.title: RainSoft Account Email
email.description: Preferred: the plugin will log in and discover your water softener hardware automatically.

password.title: RainSoft Account Password
password.description: Stored in your Homebridge config and used to refresh device info.

authToken.title: Auth Token (advanced)
authToken.description: Paste a token captured from the RainSoft app if you don’t want to store your email/password here.

deviceId.title: Device ID (advanced)
deviceId.description: ID of your RainSoft system. Required if using an auth token instead of email+password.

pollSeconds.title: Polling Interval (seconds)
pollSeconds.description: How often to poll RainSoft cloud for status updates. Default is 1800 seconds (30 minutes).

layout.title: Advanced (manual device/auth)
layout.description: Use this if you don’t want to store your RainSoft credentials here.
